Translations.Text: Inna: "anwa ay d awal nnwen, a yimceggaan
Nnan: "nekwni neppuceggaa d ar ugdud ibe$wviyen
Iwakken a ten neooem s ueou n talaxt
i ipwaoecmen s$uo Mass ik i ucmiten
Nessuffe$ kra illan, degs, n lmumnin
Nufa kan degs, yiwen uxxam n imvuaen
Neooa p id d assekni i wid iugaden aaaqeb aqeoean
I di Musa, mi t id Nuzen i Feraun, s udabu n uuee
Iaaua, akked imalalen is, inna: "d aseeear, ne$ d aoehbani
Neddem it, neppa akked iasekriwen is, Nveggeo iten ar yill. Tiyta degs
I di Aad, mi sen Nuzen avu asexvi
Ur ippaooa ayen immuger, alamma irra t am rrmim
I Tamud, mi pwanecden: "siwa tallit ara tezhum
Auuan lameo n Mass nnsen. Tewwet iten id ssiaqa, nitni la pwalin
Ur zmiren a d kren, ur pwasellken
Agdud n Nue, uqbel, llan, s tidep, d agdud iballa$en
Igenni, Nebna t s loehd, d Nekwni it Issewsaan
Tamurt, Nessa p. Ay gerzen Wid Itessun
Di yal cci, Nexleq tayuga, ahat a d tesmektim
Ihi, srifget ar Oebbi. Nek, ih, s$uoeS ar $uowen, d aneddao ipbegginen
Ur saut, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven! Nek, ih, s$uoeS ar $uowen, d aneddao ipbegginen
